IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_deserter_expired_at') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_deserter_expired_at GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_deserter_expired_at @character_id dbo.id_t, @deserter_expired_at BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Characters SET deserter_expired_at = @deserter_expired_at WHERE id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
